items.name: 18.04 Sandy Kerr
items.summary: North Sea Sessions // Burnt Mill // DDH Session IPA
items.desc:
ABV: 4.7% // OG: 1.053 // EBC: 7 // IBU: 20 // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
THE FOURTH BEER IN OUR SANDY KERR SERIES CONTINUES WITH THE THEME OF BREWING REFRESHING SESSION IPAS THAT PUNCH WELL ABOVE THEIR WEIGHT.
It also forms the second of two beers brewed in distant collaboration with Burnt Mill, who last month brewed an IPA at their home in Suffolk. For the return we worked with the same hops and yeast, seeking some consistency across the brews whilst also showing the versatility of ingredients and how they present differently through varying alcohol contents and brewing methods. We selected US varieties Mosaic and Azacca, as well as Australian variety Enigma, for the two brews.
We led with Azacca in the whirlpool, where it contributed distinct pine notes and sweet pineapple. We also included it in the dry hop to a lesser extent, letting the other two varieties lead and bring overripe tropical fruit, bubblegum and watermelon to the fore, with a classic dank West Coast character riding underneath. The grist of both beers features malted and flaked oats prominently for the silky mouthfeel they provide, and we used chit malt and maltodextrin to further boost the body of this lower ABV version.

items.name: 24.02 Tom J Newell
items.summary: Fudge Sundaze // Dancing Gnome // Cacao & Coffee Fudge Sundae Imperial Stout
items.desc:
12% ABV // 1.135 OG // 100 EBC // 25 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), LACTOSE (MILK), Demerara Sugar, Caramel, Cacao Nibs, Coffee, Vanilla Paste, Hops, Yeast
IT WAS DEVASTATING TO HAVE TO CANCEL HOP CITY THIS YEAR, BUT THE COLLABORATIONS LIVE ON. THIS FINAL COLLAB IS THE BIGGEST OF THEM ALL. WE TEAMED UP WITH OUR FRIENDS FROM DANCING GNOME, PITTSBURGH, TO WORK ON THIS MASSIVE FUDGE SUNDAE-INSPIRED IMPERIAL STOUT.
The grist features a predominant use of chocolate malt for a balance of roast character versus silky dark chocolate notes. We backed this up with plenty of flaked oats, some toasty brown malt and the dark fruit and treacle vibes brought by a blend of crystal malts.
For extra creamy, gluttonous vibes we also added demerara, lactose and vanilla to the boil as we pushed for our highest starting gravity ever. At the end of fermentation, we transferred 20g/l of cacao nibs and some coarsely crushed coffee beans to condition for a further month, rounding out this decadent treat.

items.name: 25.03 Laura Slater
items.desc:
6.5% ABV // 1.079 OG // 9 EBC // 20 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Maltodextrin, Hops, Yeast
FOR THE THIRD BEER IN OUR SERIES WITH LAURA SLATER, CONTINUING THE SINGLE HOP THEME, WE SELECTED TO WORK WITH MOSAIC. THIS HOP IS STILL RELATIVELY NEW TO THE HOP REPERTOIRE, BUT AT THE SPEED THINGS MOVE IN BREWING, IT ALREADY FEELS LIKE ONE OF THE OLD GUARDS.
A real all-rounder of a hop, and one which tends to show more variation season-to-season than most. This hop can lead to a real love-hate relationship for the brewer! On a bad day it can smell like pickled onion crisps, but when it’s on form (as its name suggests) it delivers an array of depth and flavour which make it a prime choice for the single hop treatment.
We hand-selected this year’s Mosaic with Yakima Chief back in September, where we focused on finding plenty of resinous tropical fruit character whilst keeping a balanced level of dank pine underneath, and we’re happy with how this is translating through to the beer. Backed up with plenty of flaked oats and fermented with a fruity English strain, the result is a soft, rounded IPA with distinct ripe mango, bubblegum and stone fruit flavours.

items.name: Burnt Mill
items.desc:
5.4% ABV // 440ML
Super Pale, Wheat & Oats make up the malt bill, providing a soft base to showcase the ripe tropical aromas of citrus and passionfruit from Enigma & Galaxy hops.

items.name: Enter The Haze
items.desc:
The humble IPA has been on an incredible journey. With it’s origins in England the style quickly took over the world. Initial American attempts to re-create this classic British style with big, bold US hops led the first West Coast IPA’s, over the last decade we’ve seen the style evolve again. Here we combine higher dry hopping with a water profile and yeast that gives stone and tropical fruit flavor and a hazier appearance to the beer. This is one of our favourite styles of beer and we’re proud to have championed it over the years.
Cases contain:
4 x FAITH
4 X STRIDING EDGE
4 X HEATHEN
All for £32!

items.name: Eternal
items.desc:
ABV: 4.1% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A product brewed for almost 7,000 years, a quest for perfection that never ends. Citrusy, light and refreshing. To Eternity.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Faith
items.desc:
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Hazy Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Faith In The Summer
items.desc:
5.4% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
The first in a seasonal variation on Faith, were we play with different yeasts and seasonal hops and turn everything up a few notches. This summer, we’ve brought in an English ale strain which leaves an extra residual sweetness and enhanced ripe tropical fruit esters which really enhance the double dry hop charge of Citra and Mosaic hops resulting in a smooth, juicy pale ale loaded with mango and lemon zest flavours.

items.name: Great Northern Lager
items.desc:
ABV: 4.3% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast

items.name: Heathen
items.desc:
ABV: 7.2% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT, OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A bold yet balanced New England IPA. Soft, resinous and tropical. For the Heathens.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Keep The Faith
items.desc:
Every Keep The Faith 12 pack sold includes a £3 donation for our For The North Foundation grant fund. The Foundation looks to offer £5000 grants to support vital community projects and causes in the North. Every 3 months, we advocate a different social cause. Currently, we are championing awareness of the LGBTQ+ community in the North, and this grant fund will go towards supporting projects and organisations that help this community.
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Hazy Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Neapolitan
items.desc:
ABV: 6.2% ABV // 14.00 EBC // 20 IBU // 1.068 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), LACTOSE (MILK) STRAWBERRY PUREE, HOPS, YEAST
A sweet pale ale that recreates the flavours of classic Neapolitan ice cream with the additions of lactose, strawberries and chocolate sauce.

items.name: New World IPA
items.desc:
ABV: 6.2% ABV // 14.00 EBC // 60 IBU // 1.06 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
The first hops from the new world arrived on UK shores in the 1800’s. Packed with a new world of flavour. Citrus, zest and pine. This is our tribute.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Newer World
items.desc:
7.4% ABV // 1.07 OG // 10 EBC // 30 IBU // 440ML
A bigger, juicier take on our New World IPA with oats to accentuate mouthfeel and the finest tropical and piney US hops.

items.name: Northern Heroes
items.desc:
These are go-to’s. If you were stranded on a desert Island and could only choose three beers. These would be ours. You open a pub and are only allowed three beers on draft. These are the ones. You’re having the ultimate barbecue, you open the lid of your cooler to find three beers amongst the ice… You get the idea.
Each case contains:
4 x FAITH 330ml
4 X ETERNAL 330ml
4 X NEW WORLD 330ml
All for £25.50!

items.name: Ofs006
items.desc:
4.3% ABV // 1.048 OG // 9 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Strawberry, Orange, Red Grape, Mint, Cucumber, Orange Peel, Lemon Peel, Hops, Yeast
We wanted to recreate the experience of sitting in the sun, drinking that world-renowned English summer punch, made to the classic spec. A complex mix of adjuncts take centre stage: strawberry, red grape, mint, orange, cucumber, orange peel and lemon peel. To create a beer as similar to its inspiration as possible, we used Vic Secret to bring a gentle strawberry note in the kettle, and added a whole load of different fruits and peels to bring flavour, with a gentle sourness letting the rest of the ingredients sing.

items.name: Order Of The Faith
items.desc:
6.5% ABV // 440ML
Our first collaboration with the North East’s most exciting up and coming brewery, Alpha Delta. Brewed as something of a hybrid between West Coast
and New England IPA styles, we kept the water soft and the grist rounded with oats, but hopped generously in the whirlpool with the signature resinous pine of Simcoe. We carried this through to the dry hop, adding in some juicy tropical notes alongside in the shape of Mosaic and Citra.

items.name: Origin
items.desc:
ABV: 5.7% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, MALTED BARLEY, HOPS, YEAST
(A GLUTED FREE PRODUCT)
A homage to the origins of IPA and the evolution of this style. Piney, juicy and crisp, Gluten-free and Vegan. The evolution of tradition.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Polly's Brew Co
items.desc:
4% ABV // 440ML
After the phenomenal feedback to their dry- hopped sour, Strange Addiction, Polly’s figured “Why not brew a dry-hopped Berliner Weisse?”, and immediately threw it into their brew plans. The result is Slow Burn - a Polly’s twist on the classic style, dry hopped with 15kg of Comet and Ekuanot. Crisp, clean, and subtly tart, with juicy hop notes to boot; pure sunshine trapped in a can.

items.name: Polly’S Brew
items.desc:
6.4% ABV // 440ML
A massive hop bill of Cascade, Ekuanot, Enigma and Mosaic glides around the palate like dancers at a rollerdisco, with heaps of tropical notes from Galaxy and Mosaic, backed up with a touch of complexity from Ekuanot, and some old school bite from Cascade. Wrapped up in a big warm hug of LA3 for maximum suspension and body, Polly’s welcome back Rock the Bit.

items.name: Striding Edge Hazy Light IPA
items.desc:
ABV 2.8% // 6.00 EBC // 40 IBU // 1.037 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Light IPA inspired by one of the North’s highest peaks. Piney, citrusy and fresh. For the believers.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS
